section.title: fact function
section.para: Returns the factorial of the argument.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: The fact function returns the factorial of n, commonly written as n!. n may be any numeric expression that evaluates to a positive integer. The function is defined as fact(n)=n(n-1)(n-2)...1, and relates to the gamma function as fact(n)=gamma(n+1).

section.title: gamma function
section.para: Returns the value of the Euler gamma function of the argument.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para:
The gamma function returns the result of the Euler gamma function of z, commonly written as Γ(z). z may be any numeric expression that evaluates to a real number or a complex number.
